about_the_game:
In CatMelon - Suika Game, you'll play with cute cats dressed as fruits! Since these cats love to play inside a cardboard box, your goal will be to drop each cat into the box, trying to match the identical ones. As you match, you evolve to an even bigger one! The bigger the cat, the higher the score!

Get ready to see these fruity felines grow in size and points! Can you evolve all the way up to the grand CatMelon?

3 Game Modes:

  • Classic: Play at your own pace and use strategic aids like “bath” and “shake the box” to maximize your score.

  • No Help: Prove your skill by achieving the highest score without any help.

  • Speedy Cat: Every minute, the cats drop faster. Be quick to fit them in before they get out of control!

Gameplay Mechanics:

You will be able to use two main mechanics in the game: bath and shake the box.

Use bath to remove cats that are obstructing your move.

Shake the box to try to match several identical cats that are close to each other.

Features:

  • Fruit-Dressed Cats: Explore a variety of cats wearing fruit hats, from blueberries to watermelons. Each cat is more adorable and captivating than the last, ensuring a visually charming experience!

  • Simple Controls: Move with the mouse, keyboard, or controller to choose the best position to drop the cats into the cardboard box and watch them interact with the game's physics.

  • Global Competition: Challenge players from around the world and climb up the global ranking leaderboard. How long will you hold the top spot?

name: CatMelon - Suika Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

reviews:
“The cats are cute, the assistance is a fun addition, and the fact that it has difficulty levels at all is great. There’s accessibility here, and good physics. A good pick for any Watermelon game lover.”
👍 – Ladies Gamers
short_description: Combine several adorable cats dressed as fruits inside their favorite playing space: the cardboard box! Match two identical cats to create an increasingly larger cat until you reach the CatMelon. Develop your best strategy to remain at the top of the ranking!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
